alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 4:06AM EST until January 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 12 inches by late Monday morning. Additional lake effect snow of 1 to 2 inches will continue into Monday night. Northwest winds gusting as high as 30 mph Monday afternoon through Monday night. * WHERE...Ashtabula Lakeshore and Ashtabula Inland counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will occur between 10 PM Sunday evening and 11 AM Monday morning. Snowfall rates up to 1-2 inches per hour will be possible. Snow will be wet and heavy, which could lead to tree damage and power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
